column4: ?can i set terminal as a log viewer? something like console on macs?
You can monitor files, such as longs, with tail -f /path/to/file. It'll keep montioring that file and output any changes
Are you saying tail -f is not what you want?
Well try it, that's what you're looking for I'm pretty sure. You can even monitor multiple log files in the same terminal with &.
